description: Yonshin takes its name from the Tâigí(Taiwanese) homophone for “serving tea with care.” Founded in 2015 in Kaohsiung, it blends retro-chic style with refined Taiwanese cuisine and tea, and is dedicated to promoting a new wave of teahouse culture. The Nanshan location can be found on the 2nd floor of Breeze Nanshan.
address: 2F No. 17, Songzhi Rd, Xinyi District, Taipei City 110
